duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct engineering investigations to determine root cause analysis for problems
Develop process improvements and ensure system interoperability across future system development efforts and legacy systems
Develop program technical design documentation, test plans, change management packages, and presentation materials for customer briefings
Prepare periodic status presentations to customers and program management
Adapt your expertise to the customer’s needs
Work with customers to translate users’ needs to developers ensuring customer satisfaction with the developed technologies

skills.skill: Analysis and Traceability of Technical Requirements
System Requirements Gathering and Functional Analysis
Full System Engineering Life Cycle Experience
Experience with Systems Engineering for Federal Government Contractors
Understanding of Federal Government Operational Environments
Use and/or Creation of Automated Testing Capabilities

education_certification.credential: Minimum of BS or higher degree in engineering, computer science, information technology, or related field
